name: BEYBLADE (Krugal)
description:
A downloadable game made on Scratch, on Beyblades.

Can be played on Single Player and Two Player Mode.

Controls For Single Player:

WASD - MOVEMENT

SPACEBAR - SPECIAL ATTACK

Controls For Multiplayer:

Player1: WASD - Movement, SPACEBAR - SPECIAL ATK

Player2: ARROW KEYS - Movement, 0 - SPECIAL ATK.

Download Turbowarp or Scratch editor to Play the game.
